A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't understand why critics are giving it a 9 out of 10.  I found the plot to be really dumb and the plot threads to be confusing.  Characters were shallow\, dialogue was like reading a script\, and everyone just seemed to be trying to ride on the \"Star Wars\" name.  I could talk for hours about my issues with the film (which I have) but I wanted to make my first ever Rotten Tomatoes score JUST BECAUSE I felt there is no way this should be getting 92%.  This is heading towards prequel levels in terms of quality.
